a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Malaria prevalence vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Malaria prevalence is the share of the population with malaria at any given time. This rate is age-standardized
assuming a constant population structure over time and between countries.
Share of the population with malaria
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Bank (2023)
